post:
Features
--------

All of our cPanel accounts come with the following features:

* **Let's Encrypt Support** - secure an _unlimited number of domains_ for free!
* **24\7 Ticket Support** - open a ticket any time- day or night!
* **3 Locations** - choose Los Angeles, Brooklyn, or Amsterdam!
* **Immediate Provisioning** - your account will be online within minutes!

Packages
--------
**NEW: Onra SingleSite**

* 1GB SSD Storage
* 2GB Bandwidth
* One Website

<del>$1/month</del> $0.60/month!<br />

**Onra One**

* 2GB SSD Storage
* Unmetered Bandwidth*
* Unlimited addon domains, email accounts, databases, etc.

<del>$3/month</del> $1.80/month<br />

**Onra Two**

* 10GB SSD Storage
* Unmetered Bandwidth*
* Unlimited addon domains, email accounts, databases, etc.
* **FREE DOMAIN FOR ONE YEAR**

<del>$10/month</del> $6/month<br />

[GET STARTED TODAY!](https://www.onrahost.com/shared) - **Use Coupon Code CP40OFF**

*Unmetered bandwidth is subject to our [Acceptable Use Policy](https://www.onrahost.com/aup).

Technical Support
-----------------

Onra Host's tech support is fast, helpful, and friendly. No where else will you find support this fast at this price!

The below image is generated in almost-realtime (it is cached for one hour). It calculates the average initial response time for Support tickets. *No automated replies, no broken English*

![](https://www.onrahost.com/img/average_time.php)
